channel.title: My first Axoloti-based object : USINE A GAZ #1
channel.description: Hi everyone, this is my first baby. I am very proud of. It is not talking very elaborate discourses but it is a newborn… you cannot ask him to Shekespearate… You can ear his first prattle on Vimeo : https://vimeo.com/224743169 And a second one more elaborate with the help of a modular case : filters and LFOs giving more life to the chat. https://vimeo.com/224752816 Thanks to Johannes and the community who made this possible. Best regards, Phil

item.title: My first Axoloti-based object : USINE A GAZ #1
item.dc:creator: @clerphil Philippe Clérin
item.description:
@clerphil wrote:

Hi everyone,

this is my first baby. I am very proud of.
It is not talking very elaborate discourses but it is a newborn… you cannot ask him to Shekespearate…
You can ear his first prattle on Vimeo : https://vimeo.com/224743169

And a second one more elaborate with the help of a modular case : filters and LFOs giving more life to the chat. https://vimeo.com/224752816

Thanks to Johannes and the community who made this possible.
Best regards,

Phil
